FUNDRAISING INTERNSHIP AT GREEN BHUMI About Green Bhumi : Green Bhumi is a vibrant platform dedicated to fostering environmentalconsciousness and action globally. At the heart of our initiative, lies theestablishment and promotion of Environmentalism and fosteringcommunity engagement through impactful environmental activism. Green Bhumi is a flagship project (initiative) under the Top TroveFoundation that envisions a life free from pollution and enriched withfresh air. Our mission is to inspire and empower communities to plant trees, harnessing nature's positive impact on lives while contributing tosocio-economic well-being. About the Internship : We are looking for passionate and proactive FUNDRAISING INTERNSwho can raise funds by reaching out to their personal and socialnetworks, including friends, family, neighbours, and communities. Thisrole offers an opportunity to make a tangible impact by helpingGreenBhumi achieve its goals through grassroots fundraising. Duration : 15 days Type : Remote/Work From Home Internship Stipend : Unpaid Internship Key Responsibilities: ● Approach friends, family, neighbours, and acquaintances to raisefunds for GreenBhumi's initiatives. ● Educate potential donors about GreenBhumi’s mission and theimpact of their contributions. ● Utilize personal and social networks (offline and online) tomaximize fundraising efforts. ● Maintain accurate records of donations received and ensure timelyreporting.● Work closely with the fundraising team to meet targets andstrategize new approaches. Requirements : ● Strong communication and persuasion skills. ● A proactive and confident approach to fundraising. ● Socially active with good networking abilities. ● Passion for environmental and social causes. ● Self-motivated, responsible, and result-oriented. ● Prior experience in Fundraising Domain will be a plus Benefits: ● Certificate of Completion ● Letter of Recommendation (performance based). ● Promotions at the Internship ● Recognition on Social Media (performance based) ● Hands-on experience in grassroots fundraising and networking. ● Opportunity to contribute to a meaningful cause and create socialimpact. ● Flexible working hours to suit your schedule. FUNDRAISING INTERNSHIP AT GREEN BHUMI About Green Bhumi : Green Bhumi is a vibrant platform dedicated to fostering environmentalconsciousness and action globally. At the heart of our initiative, lies theestablishment and promotion of Environmentalism and fosteringcommunity engagement through impactful environmental activism. Green Bhumi is a flagship project (initiative) under the Top TroveFoundation that envisions a life free from pollution and enriched withfresh air. Our mission is to inspire and empower communities to plant trees, harnessing nature's positive impact on lives while contributing tosocio-economic well-being. About the Internship : We are looking for passionate and proactive FUNDRAISING INTERNSwho can raise funds by reaching out to their personal and socialnetworks, including friends, family, neighbours, and communities. Thisrole offers an opportunity to make a tangible impact by helpingGreenBhumi achieve its goals through grassroots fundraising. Duration : 15 days Type : Remote/Work From Home Internship Stipend : Unpaid Internship Key Responsibilities: ● Approach friends, family, neighbours, and acquaintances to raisefunds for GreenBhumi's initiatives. ● Educate potential donors about GreenBhumi’s mission and theimpact of their contributions. ● Utilize personal and social networks (offline and online) tomaximize fundraising efforts. ● Maintain accurate records of donations received and ensure timelyreporting.● Work closely with the fundraising team to meet targets andstrategize new approaches. Requirements : ● Strong communication and persuasion skills. ● A proactive and confident approach to fundraising. ● Socially active with good networking abilities. ● Passion for environmental and social causes. ● Self-motivated, responsible, and result-oriented. ● Prior experience in Fundraising Domain will be a plus Benefits: ● Certificate of Completion ● Letter of Recommendation (performance based). ● Promotions at the Internship ● Recognition on Social Media (performance based) ● Hands-on experience in grassroots fundraising and networking. ● Opportunity to contribute to a meaningful cause and create socialimpact. ● Flexible working hours to suit your schedule. How to Apply: Interested candidates can send their CV/Resume to [priyaldubey2@gmail.com] with thesubject line “Fundraising Internship Application.”hashtag#fundraisinginternships hashtag#careers hashtag#opportunity hashtag#hiring hashtag#freshers hashtag#workfromhome hashtag#internships hashtag#socialwelfare hashtag#toptrovefoundation

At the heart of our initiative, lies theestablishment and promotion of Environmentalism and fosteringcommunity engagement through impactful environmental activism. Our mission is to inspire and empower communities to plant trees, harnessing nature's positive impact on lives while contributing tosocio-economic well-being. About the Internship : We are looking for passionate and proactive FUNDRAISING INTERNSwho can raise funds by reaching out to their personal and socialnetworks, including friends, family, neighbours, and communities. Thisrole offers an opportunity to make a tangible impact by helpingGreenBhumi achieve its goals through grassroots fundraising. Requirements : ● Strong communication and persuasion skills. ● A proactive and confident approach to fundraising. ● Socially active with good networking abilities. ● Passion for environmental and social causes. ● Self-motivated, responsible, and result-oriented. ● Prior experience in Fundraising Domain will be a plus Benefits: ● Certificate of Completion ● Letter of Recommendation (performance based). ● Promotions at the Internship ● Recognition on Social Media (performance based) ● Hands-on experience in grassroots fundraising and networking. ● Opportunity to contribute to a meaningful cause and create socialimpact. ● Flexible working hours to suit your schedule. FUNDRAISING INTERNSHIP AT GREEN BHUMI About Green Bhumi : Green Bhumi is a vibrant platform dedicated to fostering environmentalconsciousness and action globally. At the heart of our initiative, lies theestablishment and promotion of Environmentalism and fosteringcommunity engagement through impactful environmental activism. Green Bhumi is a flagship project (initiative) under the Top TroveFoundation that envisions a life free from pollution and enriched withfresh air. Our mission is to inspire and empower communities to plant trees, harnessing nature's positive impact on lives while contributing tosocio-economic well-being. About the Internship : We are looking for passionate and proactive FUNDRAISING INTERNSwho can raise funds by reaching out to their personal and socialnetworks, including friends, family, neighbours, and communities. Thisrole offers an opportunity to make a tangible impact by helpingGreenBhumi achieve its goals through grassroots fundraising. Duration : 15 days Type : Remote/Work From Home Internship Stipend : Unpaid Internship Key Responsibilities: ● Approach friends, family, neighbours, and acquaintances to raisefunds for GreenBhumi's initiatives. ● Educate potential donors about GreenBhumi’s mission and theimpact of their contributions. ● Utilize personal and social networks (offline and online) tomaximize fundraising efforts. ● Maintain accurate records of donations received and ensure timelyreporting.● Work closely with the fundraising team to meet targets andstrategize new approaches. Requirements : ● Strong communication and persuasion skills. ● A proactive and confident approach to fundraising. ● Socially active with good networking abilities. ● Passion for environmental and social causes. ● Self-motivated, responsible, and result-oriented. ● Prior experience in Fundraising Domain will be a plus Benefits: ● Certificate of Completion ● Letter of Recommendation (performance based). ● Promotions at the Internship ● Recognition on Social Media (performance based) ● Hands-on experience in grassroots fundraising and networking. ● Opportunity to contribute to a meaningful cause and create socialimpact. ● Flexible working hours to suit your schedule. FUNDRAISING INTERNSHIP AT GREEN BHUMI About Green Bhumi : Green Bhumi is a vibrant platform dedicated to fostering environmentalconsciousness and action globally. At the heart of our initiative, lies theestablishment and promotion of Environmentalism and fosteringcommunity engagement through impactful environmental activism. Green Bhumi is a flagship project (initiative) under the Top TroveFoundation that envisions a life free from pollution and enriched withfresh air. Our mission is to inspire and empower communities to plant trees, harnessing nature's positive impact on lives while contributing tosocio-economic well-being. About the Internship : We are looking for passionate and proactive FUNDRAISING INTERNSwho can raise funds by reaching out to their personal and socialnetworks, including friends, family, neighbours, and communities. Thisrole offers an opportunity to make a tangible impact by helpingGreenBhumi achieve its goals through grassroots fundraising. Duration : 15 days Type : Remote/Work From Home Internship Stipend : Unpaid Internship Key Responsibilities: ● Approach friends, family, neighbours, and acquaintances to raisefunds for GreenBhumi's initiatives. ● Educate potential donors about GreenBhumi’s mission and theimpact of their contributions. ● Utilize personal and social networks (offline and online) tomaximize fundraising efforts. ● Maintain accurate records of donations received and ensure timelyreporting.● Work closely with the fundraising team to meet targets andstrategize new approaches. Requirements : ● Strong communication and persuasion skills. ● A proactive and confident approach to fundraising. ● Socially active with good networking abilities. ● Passion for environmental and social causes. ● Self-motivated, responsible, and result-oriented. ● Prior experience in Fundraising Domain will be a plus Benefits: ● Certificate of Completion ● Letter of Recommendation (performance based). ● Promotions at the Internship ● Recognition on Social Media (performance based) ● Hands-on experience in grassroots fundraising and networking. ● Opportunity to contribute to a meaningful cause and create socialimpact. ● Flexible working hours to suit your schedule. At the heart of our initiative, lies theestablishment and promotion of Environmentalism and fosteringcommunity engagement through impactful environmental activism. Green Bhumi is a flagship project (initiative) under the Top TroveFoundation that envisions a life free from pollution and enriched withfresh air. Our mission is to inspire and empower communities to plant trees, harnessing nature's positive impact on lives while contributing tosocio-economic well-being. About the Internship : We are looking for passionate and proactive FUNDRAISING INTERNSwho can raise funds by reaching out to their personal and socialnetworks, including friends, family, neighbours, and communities. Thisrole offers an opportunity to make a tangible impact by helpingGreenBhumi achieve its goals through grassroots fundraising. At the heart of our initiative, lies theestablishment and promotion of Environmentalism and fosteringcommunity engagement through impactful environmental activism. Our mission is to inspire and empower communities to plant trees, harnessing nature's positive impact on lives while contributing tosocio-economic well-being. At the heart of our initiative, lies theestablishment and promotion of Environmentalism and fosteringcommunity engagement through impactful environmental activism. Green Bhumi is a flagship project (initiative) under the Top TroveFoundation that envisions a life free from pollution and enriched withfresh air. Our mission is to inspire and empower communities to plant trees, harnessing nature's positive impact on lives while contributing tosocio-economic well-being. Requirements : ● Strong communication and persuasion skills. ● A proactive and confident approach to fundraising. ● Socially active with good networking abilities. ● Passion for environmental and social causes. ● Self-motivated, responsible, and result-oriented. ● Prior experience in Fundraising Domain will be a plus Benefits: ● Certificate of Completion ● Letter of Recommendation (performance based). ● Promotions at the Internship ● Recognition on Social Media (performance based) ● Hands-on experience in grassroots fundraising and networking. ● Opportunity to contribute to a meaningful cause and create socialimpact. ● Flexible working hours to suit your schedule.
